🤖 Systems

☀️ Wake up at 7 every day

Only exceptions are when you go out with friends

Cue: Alarm Clock ⏰

🚿 Cold shower, eat, and leave the house in the morning

Get out of the house as early as you can. This makes me twice as productive

Cue: Immediately after waking up 🔗

📝 First task is to plan the day

Plan the goal for the day. Pick ONE thing. Anything else should be appointment or deadline based.

Cue: Immediately after arriving at work spot 🔗

🕸️ If it is a friday, write a weekly report

This is incredibly important for accountability. Make sure to include all the work you achieved each day.

Cue: Alarm Clock ⏰

🍅 Pomodoro 💙

You work way better with a timer. That and this makes sure you take breaks! Breaks are useful so you're relaxed and also so you have the energy to do an extra pomodoro session that day.

Cue: When you are about to start working 💼
